text: Marjan Pečar (27 January 1941 - 1 August 2019) was a Slovenian ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1968 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Slovenian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Yugoslavia Category:Ski jumpers at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:People from the Municipality of Kranjska Gora
title: Marjan Pečar
